data.text: @yangleicq @182_DuncH @getbentweirdos There no such thing as Covid so not sure how you can prove “long Covid”, turn off your tele.
@getbentweirdos They do. There are also loads of idiots nodding along and parroting this insanity.
@getbentweirdos @LutherB99406283 Since he looks like a wax dummy, I'd say 'long covid' is the least of his problems.
@getbentweirdos Nothing to do with all the crack then?
@182_DuncH @getbentweirdos Do you have the source saying there is no difference? Long Covid is a thing but the rate is exaggerated to me.

@getbentweirdos The biggest study, done in the US with 300,000 people in each group, showed no symptoms that were apparent in higher rates specifically linked to "long Covid" .
Yes, it's bullshit.
@Matt58539235 @lydbloo @getbentweirdos He has enough on his plate being ginger
@real_b4_ @lydbloo @getbentweirdos Surprised he hasn't got that as well
